channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [BEAM-12625] beam_PostCommit_Java_ValidatesRunner_Spark failing because testTwoTimersSettingEachOtherWithCreateAsInputUnbounded
item.description:
Example: https://ci-beam.apache.org/job/beam_PostCommit_Java_ValidatesRunner_Spark/9111/testReport/

 

Failing test: org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms.ParDoTest$TimerTests.testTwoTimersSettingEachOtherWithCreateAsInputUnbounded

 

 

Error:

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: This test should be excluded because it uses an unbounded pcoll, but it isn't annotated accordingly.
I can confirm this is fixed at HEAD.
